SEARCH

Class Module

java.lang.Object
Module
public class Module extends Object
The Module class represents an academic module in a university. It includes information about the module name, code, professor, credits, and associated students. The class also manages student grades and provides methods for handling module-related operations.

    • Module

      public Module(int moduleMapCode, String moduleName, String moduleCode, int credits, Programme programme, String professor)
      Constructs a new Module with the specified parameters and the default grading system for the university.
      Parameters:
      moduleMapCode - The code representing the module's year and semester.
      moduleName - The name of the module.
      moduleCode - The code of the module.
      credits - The credit value of the module.
      programme - The associated programme.
      professor - The professor teaching the module.

    • Module

      professor - The professor teaching the module.
      year - The year in which the module is offered.
      semester - The semester in which the module is offered.
